Container.Name: WebGrabPlusPlus
Container.Description: WebGrab+Plus is a multi-site incremental xmltv epg grabber. It collects tv-program guide data from selected tvguide sites for your favourite channels.[br] Optional postprocessors to add IMDb data or to customize your xmltv listing.[br] http://www.webgrabplus.com/[br] [b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : This is where WebGrab+Plus will store it\'s configuration.[br][br] [b]/data[/b] : This is where tv_grab_wg script in the Tvheadend container looks for the guide.xml file.[br][br]
